goalToMqtt.py

1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 import rospy
3 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist
4 from std_msgs.msg import String
5 import paho.mqtt.client as paho
6 import json
7 import sys
8 def constrain(val, min_val, max_val):
9  return min(max_val, max(min_val, val))
10 def sign_of(value):
11  if value < 0 :
12  return -1
13  if value == 0:
14  return 0
15  else:
16  return 1
17 
18 def translate(value, leftMin, leftMax, rightMin, rightMax):
19  if(value == 0):
20  return 0
21  # Figure out how 'wide' each range is
22  leftSpan = leftMax - leftMin
23  rightSpan = rightMax - rightMin
24 
25  # Convert the left range into a 0-1 range (float)
26  valueScaled = float(value - leftMin) / float(leftSpan)
27 
28  # Convert the 0-1 range into a value in the right range.
29  return rightMin + (valueScaled * rightSpan)
30 def omniwheel_velocity(l_x,l_y,a_z):
31  rospy.loginfo("velo")
32 
33  w_1p = -1 * sign_of(a_z)
34  w_2p = 1 * sign_of(l_x)
35  w_3p = 1 * sign_of(l_y)
36  return [w_1p,w_2p,w_3p]
37 def on_publish(client, userdata, mid):
38  print("mid: "+str(mid))
39  # linear velocity l_x and l_y
40  # angular velocity a_z
41 def callback(data,args):
42  bot_index = args
43  velocity_list = omniwheel_velocity(data.linear.x,data.linear.y,data.angular.z)
44  print("")
45  jsonData = {"angular": velocity_list[0],"linear_x":velocity_list[1],"linear_y":velocity_list[2],"servo":0}#,"pwm3":velocity_list[2],"pwm4":velocity_list[3]}
46  jsonEncoded = json.dumps(jsonData)
47  (rc, mid) = client.publish("flipkart/bot"+str(bot_index), jsonEncoded, qos=0)
48  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s and published to %d", jsonData,bot_index)
49  if(data.angular.z != 0):
50  rospy.logwarn(data.angular.z)
51 def callback_servo(data,args):
52  bot_index = args
53  jsonData = {"angular":0,"linear_x":0,"linear_y":0,"servo":data.data,"colorRequest":0}
54  jsonEncoded = json.dumps(jsonData)
55  (rc, mid) = client.publish("flipkart/bot"+str(bot_index), jsonEncoded, qos=0)
56  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s and published to %d", jsonEncoded,bot_index)
57 
58 def callback_color(data,args):
59  bot_index = args
60  jsonData = {"angular":0,"linear_x":0,"linear_y":0,"servo":0,"colorRequest":1}
61  jsonEncoded = json.dumps(jsonData)
62  (rc, mid) = client.publish("flipkart/bot"+str(bot_index), jsonEncoded, qos=0)
63  rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s and published to %d", jsonEncoded,bot_index)
64 def listener(bot_no):
65 
66  rospy.init_node('listener_mqtt')
67  rospy.loginfo(bot_no)
68  rospy.Subscriber("/flipbot"+str(bot_no)+"/cmd_vel", Twist, callback,bot_no)
69  rospy.Subscriber("/flipbot"+str(bot_no)+"/servo", String, callback_servo,bot_no)
70  rospy.Subscriber("/flipbot"+str(bot_no)+"/colorReq", String, callback_color,bot_no)
71  # spin() simply keeps python from exiting until this node is stopped
72  rospy.spin()
73 
74 
75 client = paho.Client()
76 client.on_publish = on_publish
77 client.connect("192.168.0.172", 1883)
78 client.loop_start()
79 if __name__ == '__main__':
80  print("\nName of the bot = flibot", sys.argv[1])
81  listener(int(sys.argv[1]))
